title: Wendy invites you to visit her personal website
intro: Wendy Chen is a extremely passionate and dedicated front end developer with 1+ year of experience building UI & UX using React & Redux. Also, she has a solid background in SQL and Python and am familiar with Azure Enviroment as well.

title: Wendy invites you to see her work on Github
intro: Wendy Chen has a strong willingness to stay in tune with the lastest technologies. She is eager to skill in web architecture and work on different aspects of application development.

title: Wendy invites you to connect with her on Linkedin
intro: Let's be friends! Wendy loves communicating with people and exchanging thoughts on web development. It is a good way to increase knowledge and keep innovative.

title: Wendy invites you to contact her or make suggestions through Email
intro: If you have amazing projects on hand, do not hesitate to contact Wendy. Her skillsets and work ethic won't let you regret to hire her!
